mapper.select: select P.id, P.user_id, P.name, P.phone, P.email from Program AS P JOIN User AS U ON U.id = P.user_id AND P.deldate is null ORDER BY P.regdate desc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Program (category_id, program_name, information, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{category_id}, #{program_name}, #{information}, #{start_date}, #{end_date})
